title: help pls
body:
im mastery 7 on my teemo and it says it right on my profile how do i get rid of it (i had like 7 people unfriend me because of it rip)

i am one with the cancer

replies.body:
You can have it hidden from the *immediate area* of your profile page by getting to Master 7 with three other champions and gain more *mastery points* on those champions than you have on Teemo.

I hope this helped. Check out our [Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) for more info on this system. Let me know if you have any questions.
